channel.title: Sony Patents Mid Game Ad Delivery System
channel.description:
[url]https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2012-05-25-sony-patents-method-to-interrupt-your-gaming-with-an-ad[/url] [quote] First, game playing gradually slows down. You then get a warning that the game is about to stop. You then get the ad. Sony's example is: "BEST BRAND SODA. You've got to try it!" You then get a warning that the game is about to resume. The game resumes. There's mention of rewinding the game after the ad has run its course, too. [/quote] ![](upload://1vwqqmlrGQ3VV0nfviewRgeFt9A.jpeg)
If this gets interrupted in any shape or form, I fear for the future of the game industry. Game prices should go down if this happens but I already know they won't. We've already seen games with ads in them (Deus Ex HR on the loading screens) and the 360 has ads all over the dashboard despite that owners of the console pay for the console, games, and the ability to play online.

item.title: Sony Patents Mid Game Ad Delivery System
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
That’s a tad different than telling you the game is gonna get paused and playing a commercial.

Read full topic

They already did that with Deus Ex HR.

Mont_Blanc:

I don’t remember any ads while I playing DEx

They were added in an update. They were relatively small and unobtrusive IMO, and of course they were only shown on loading screens.

item.title: Sony Patents Mid Game Ad Delivery System
item.dc:creator: 3dwizzard
item.description:
Good thing I decided to quit console gaming entirely after playstation 2’s life cycle ended.
Never bothered with what I considered from day one to be a shitty generation of consoles.
I thought that ps3 and 360 are shit from day one of their release and funnily, I still think that today.
Not even 7 or 8 years of their games managed to change my mind.
I sure as hell don’t intend to buy consoles when ps4 and the new xbox come out, all I have to say is fuck them to hell even more than ps3 and 360!
Pc gaming is the only acceptable way for me.
Today’s consoles are for those that want to play all games with gamepads and be graphically limited by hardware that rapidly becomes outdated and can’t be upgraded + have to pay shitty subscriptions for all kinds of basic features that should come free…

If consoles are like dugs and people get addicted to them, it’s only fair that microsoft and sony take advantage of their addiction and make them buy more shit from them.
I would be so glad if this patent would get implemented in ps4 so that playstation fans would get raped in all of their holes with ads.
Maybe if they get screwed around enough, they too will realize that consoles should get the fuck out of their lives and they should start moving to pc gaming.

Read full topic
item.source: Sony Patents Mid Game Ad Delivery System

item.dc:creator: fade
item.description:
Cant see them including this stuff anywhere other than in free to play, or subscription based games that also have a free to play element… The amount of bad PR a move to include this into the traditional AAA model would create would destroy any chance of success that game had of making any money… Surely they would understand that

item.title: Sony Patents Mid Game Ad Delivery System
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I could see Sony slapping a “This respawn brought to you by [insert product here]” whenever you die in Dust, but if this gets put into a multiplayer game in the form that is shown in the first post, that’ll be dumb. The only place I could really see it working is in a demo, or an f2p singleplayer game.
